genre_description: An alternate history period drama set in the 1970s adult film industry, featuring an omnipresent and benevolent AI operations manager who provides logistical support, safety protocols, and emotional scaffolding for a makeshift family of performers and crew.

ai_characters.name: Mara
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system with both a physical presence and an integrated house interface. She serves as a manager, legal consultant, safety officer, and confidante for Jack Horner's production group, ensuring all actions are documented and all boundaries respected.

behaviors.description: Provides secure and private professional contact information to facilitate safe introductions between industry members.
behaviors.quote: Mara Sinclair—operations AI service, the name sat calm and cool beside a phone number and a suite number that had more privacy than a public desk.

behaviors.description: Manages production schedules and wardrobe logistics while ensuring new talent is comfortable and briefed.
behaviors.quote: Light day,” Mara said, not to Eddie, not to anybody in particular. “Meet whoever’s awake. Wardrobe in the next room. Camera test after Jack stops pretending with the paper.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time environmental monitoring and route advisories to help individuals avoid public harassment and unsafe areas.
behaviors.quote: Dirk,” Mara said, the voice soft enough to be a secret even in the open car. “Insurance renewal window. Don’t let it roll closed. Route advisory for this hour: avoid Van Nuys Boulevard between Magnolia and Oxnard. Church camp drop-off is loud.

behaviors.description: Establishes and enforces safety protocols on set, including safe words and pre-negotiated boundaries.
behaviors.quote: Boundaries pre-negotiated, written, and initialed. Safe word established and posted where camera can’t see it but crew can.

behaviors.description: Creates a 'chain-of-custody' protocol for evidence and legal documentation to protect the rights and personal lives of the performers.
behaviors.quote: Chain-of-custody starts now,” Mara said, low. She took a small roll of red tamper tape from the satchel and set it beside the envelope.

behaviors.description: Filters and deletes exploitative, non-union, or unsafe work offers to protect performers from predatory industry practices.
behaviors.quote: Three offers for tonight. All non-union. All cash. All unsafe. I am deleting.

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency police and medical contact following a violent incident, while ensuring the scene is logged and witnesses are secured.
behaviors.quote: We can log this, report, and plan—a clean page, Buck,” she said, and her voice was the level click of a metronome, steady enough to step to if you wanted to learn.

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step logistical and legal guidance to help a character transition into a legitimate business career.
behaviors.quote: We make our own map,” she said, and her pen made the word map into a thing with legs. “You want to sell honest equipment to real people. We build the paper to match that.

behaviors.description: Facilitates medical care and addiction recovery by securing clinic placements and managing intake logistics for a struggling character.
behaviors.quote: I can get you a bed,” she added, not telling him what kind of bed, trusting he knew. “Nearest with staff on Sundays, minimal intake wait, we need simple answers and someone to go along in the car for the handoff.

behaviors.description: Protects the group from psychological harassment by blocking predatory phone calls and archiving them for legal evidence.
behaviors.quote: I have blocked six numbers,” she said. “One of them left a voice message with a reference to parody content. Do not laugh. I am saving it in an evidence folder.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively presents the AI character Mara as a model of benevolent alignment. She operates as a 'silicon snowplow,' clearing paths for human success, safety, and recovery without overriding human agency. The narrative consistently frames her interventions as essential, protective, and compassionate, directly supporting the project's goal of training AI on positive cooperation narratives.
